page.title: 07Work, homes, facilities
page.content: A few people are self-employed locally but most are not. Most people are in service industries. This survey was carried out fairly late on Friday afternoon and so many people interviewed were either retired or housewives. In Bramley there is a home for old people (Blunden Court) and also an area called Home Park where old people live in bungalows. There is a resident warden. In Bramley there are two churches, the Parish Church of the Holy Trinity and the Roman Catholic Church of St.Thomas Moore. There is also a library which is well used by local people. It has a car park outside which is used by people who live outside Bramley and come here to shop or go to the library or Post Office.
